title: USA States & Territories
description: Fetch USA states data, filter out territories and northeast states, sort them, and display them in a virtualized list with search and debounce.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe (MVC)
description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game implemented using the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architectural pattern in plain JavaScript.

title: To-Do List (MVC)
description: A To-Do list application built with the MVC pattern, supporting adding and deleting tasks.

title: Single Number
description: Given a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one using bit manipulation.

title: Squares of a Sorted Array
description: Given an integer array nums sorted in non-decreasing order, return an array of the squares of each number sorted in non-decreasing order.

title: Count Repeats
description: An exercise to count and identify repeated elements within a dataset, showcasing data manipulation techniques.

title: Plain JS Search
description: A live search filter implemented in vanilla JavaScript that filters a list of items as you type.

title: Singleton Pattern
description: A demonstration of the Singleton design pattern in JavaScript, ensuring a class has only one instance.

title: User Session Manager
description: A TypeScript-based utility for managing user sessions, including storage and retrieval of session data.

title: Cat, Rabbit, Snail Game
description: A simple game involving characters like a Cat, Rabbit, and Snail, demonstrating basic game logic and rendering.

title: Find Rectangle
description: Given a 2D array of 0s and 1s, identify the coordinates of the single solid rectangle made of 1s.

title: Observer Pattern
description: Practice implementing the Observer design pattern. Create a subject that notifies multiple observers of state changes.

title: Merge Sort Algorithm
description: Implementation of the Merge Sort algorithm, a divide-and-conquer approach to sorting arrays efficiently.

title: Decorator Pattern
description: Implement withTiming and withCallCount functions that add measuring behavior without modifying logic.
